data.question: What is the chemical formula of the compound that was synthesized using Co2(CO)8, Se, and triphenylphosphine (PPh3) as starting materials?
What method was used to grow crystals suitable for X-ray diffraction of the compound [NBu4]4[trans-Co6Se8(CN)4(CO)2]?
data.answer: Crystals were grown from slow evaporation of a DCM solution.

data.question: How was the compound [Co(py)4]2[trans-Co6Se8(CN)4(CO)2] synthesized?
data.answer: By layering an aqueous solution of cobalt dibromide (CoBr2) on top of a solution containing the precursor and pyridine in water, allowing the layers to mix and grow crystals over 7 days.

data.question: What was the purpose of treating [NBu4]3[trans-Co6Se8(CN4)(CO)2] with ferrocenium hexafluorophosphate ([Fc][PF6])?
data.answer: To oxidize the compound and monitor the reaction completion by observing changes in IR spectra.

data.question: True or False: The compound [Co(py)4]2[trans-Co6Se8(CN)4(CO)2] can be mechanically exfoliated to produce atomically thin flakes.
What technique was used to confirm the absence of bromine in the synthesized compound [Co(py)4]2[trans-Co6Se8(CN)4(CO)2]?
What was the result of irradiating exfoliated flakes of [Co(py)4]2[trans-Co6Se8(CN)4(CO)2] with blue light in the presence of 4-isocyanoazobenzene (CNAB)?
data.answer: The surface CO ligands were replaced by CNAB, as monitored by Raman spectroscopy.

data.question: True or False: The magnetic susceptibility measurements of [NBu4]3[trans-Co6Se8(CN)4(CO)2] indicate a molecular ground state of S = 3/2.
What was observed in the cyclic voltammetry of [Co(py)4]2[trans-Co6Se8(CN)4(CO)2]?
data.answer: Two oxidation events and one reduction event were observed, consistent with the redox activity of the sheets.

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of [Co(py)4]2[trans-Co6Se8(CN)4(CO)2] is highly sensitive to the amount of CoBr2 added.
